page.title: 16 A WEEK'S NEWS
page.content: retired after 25 years of assistant cook at Eaglesham Primary School.There was a collection from the children and the money was presented by her grandaughter Jillianne Laidlaw.There was also an article on the Round Tablers AGM,who selected a new chairman,vice-chairman and a new secretary.Lastly Eaglesham won the Third Division Title against Pollockshields 3-1 in Eaglesham.They were also very pleased with their goalkeeper Willie Lynch who only let in one goal in the second half.Their manager was very pleased and delighted that they had finally won after some very tough heats.Also,in this weeks Extra there was an article about the Eaglesham Ladies Circle who held a book sale at the East Kilbride Plaza. They raised Â£300.They also held an AGM and elected new office bearers.For the
